actions.text: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Horn, Kendra S..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Horn, Kendra S..
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the GAO to submit to Congress within one year of the bills enactment a report on the effect that closure of the U.S. Export Finance Agency would have on businesses that utilize the Agencys services.
purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the GAO to submit to Congress within one year of the bills enactment a report on the effect that closure of the U.S. Export Finance Agency would have on businesses that utilize the Agencys services.
